survey_name: Freelancer Tax Preparation Software Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from freelancers regarding their satisfaction and experience with tax preparation software, focusing on usability, features, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: Which tax preparation software do you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Provide an 'Other' option with a text field to capture responses not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which tax preparation software do you currently use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current tax preparation software?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency in measuring satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current tax preparation software?

questions.question_text: What features do you find most useful in your tax preparation software? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand which features are valued the most.
questions.scripter_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What features do you find most useful in your tax preparation software? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your tax preparation software?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback on pain points.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field for responses.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your tax preparation software?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your current tax preparation software to other freelancers?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge overall recommendation intent.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for responses.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your current tax preparation software to other freelancers?
